Name: Amulet of Zhar-Tul
Description: The wearer may attack twice per turn.

Name: Brass Knuckles
Description: Is that tarnish or old blood? +1 attack.
Location: chest outside of southwest village fence

Name: Cloth Shoes
Description: Better than barefoot, but not by much! +1 defense.

Name: Cloth Tunic
Description: Worn and scruffy, but warm enough. +1 defense.

Name: Defender’s Breastplate
Description: +4 defense. The wearer does not stop defending at start of turn.

Name: Dreamer’s Ring
Description: Where did this come from? +4 defense, -4 speed.

Name: Fancy Cloth Hat
Description: It looks completely ridiculous. +1 max health.

Name: Simple Cloth Hat
Description: If only it covered the ears. +1 defense.

Name: Studded Leather Tunic
Description: Rough yet tough. +2 defense, +1 max health.
Location: chest north of first cave exit

Name: Tempus Ring
Description: It hums and vibrates unnaturally. +5 speed.
